mapper.insert: INSERT INTO usersRes_mp (id, num, movieName, saveFileName, price, paymentWay, point, regdate) VALUES(#{id}, usersRes_mp_seq.NEXTVAL, #{movieName}, #{saveFileName}, #{price}, #{paymentWay}, #{point}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT sum(price) sumPrice FROM usersRes_mp WHERE id=#{id} AND currCon=0
SELECT id, num, movieName, saveFileName, price, paymentWay, currCon, point, regdate FROM usersRes_mp WHERE id=#{id} AND to_char(regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') > to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'yyyy-mm-dd')
